name: Mod My...
tag_list: mod, mods, modding, custom, customizing, customization, social-networking
overview:
Mod My… is a customization and social networking hybrid website for modding enthusiasts.

Users can create and design their mods using visual templates and upload them to their Facebook and Mod My… profiles for friends to see. Users can also elect to have their created mods made by the Mod My… staff.
